/.intro_text: I am a software developer based in HKSAR. I love programming, history, and traveling. I wish this website helps you to know more about me. XD
/.profile_text:
I possess substantial expertise in Next.js, .NET, and Flutter.

Most of my projects are posted on my GitHub - myworldbox. Please feel free to refer to take a look.

As a fervent enthusiast of the intricate fields of full-stack development and algorithmic trading, I have obtained a degree in Computer Engineering at HKUST. With an ardent desire to excel in my chosen career path, I am wholeheartedly compelled to pursue this opportunity with unwavering dedication.

My portfolio of accomplishments as a full-stack developer includes noteworthy contributions to influential associations such as AWS Educate, HKUST Path Advisor, and USThing. Furthermore, I have also been bestowed with the HKT300 seed fund, amounting to HKD 100,000, for my pioneering project, UniLetsBeFd.
/.school: The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology
/.motto: True in word, resolute in deed.
